analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x64391a1f01c49ae731e258b451afe387f6f57df4.sol:
	Contract DCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x64391a1f01c49ae731e258b451afe387f6f57df4.sol#255-256)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
